title: The Difference Between Honesty & Complaining
itunes:author: Guest: Tricia Goyer
itunes:summary:
Just like poison is to your body, complaining is toxic for your home environment. But if you'll deal with it, your home can experience a new sense of peace. John and Danny offer some ideas for how to practice thankfulness in your home. Featuring Tricia Goyer.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Tricia Goyer's book "The Grumble-Free Year" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-07-22?refcd=1127203

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/the-difference-between-honesty-and-complaining/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
